attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking it would be interesting to check out. right off the bat it literally took 4 hours to download and made my phone over heat. after it downloaded i went to the app and to my surprise the layout was horrible, everything was cluttered and a accidentally clicked on a pop up that gave me a virus. i’m pretty sure this app gave me some sort of curse as well, because strange things started happening the second i downloaded it. i do not recommend this app at all! worst decision of my life.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE✨
attributes.review: The absolute worst app ever. What a disgusting, bigoted, misogynistic, evil, vile, nazi-loving, racist, orange Cheeto puff of a app. This app was so bad that it took me to my LITERAL DEATH⚰️. I DIED. Not to mention that the app took 10 years to download onto my phone! What kind of app is so incompetent that it takes 10 years to download?!?!?? Then as soon as it downloaded it put viruses on my phone😡 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Worst experience ever
attributes.review: I cannot believe how disgusted i am with my use of this app. First, it falsely advertised on this page what is was going to do for me. Second, while running it continually shut down for unseen reasons and closed all the other apps i had open with it. I am utterly disappointed. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: The app itself is at up in a very inconvenient manner. It’s hard to navigate an constantly kicked me out EVER TIME I opened it. It brought a virus to my phone and it caused my phone to shut down even if I had a high battery percentage. I HIGHLY recommend you never download this app. It’s completely horrible.

this app took FOREVER to download!! and once it did, it was glitchy!! nothing would load, it took forever to log in. i kept finding weird errors. it would freeze my phone ever 2 minutes. my phone kept crashing whenever i opened the app!! terrible app.

attributes.title: Disturbing!!!😖😡
attributes.review: If I could rate this app a 0 I’d do it in a heartbeat! Not only did it take years to download, but spammed my phone with notifications when I refused to receive them! I did not enjoy the friendly pedophiles hacking my device from this app either.😐save yourself the time and don’t download it.

attributes.title: gave me eczema
attributes.review: this app was so filthy, it made my skin itch and feel dirty. this app also gave me severe swarsviorosis. which is an illness that means i can no longer eat oranges. the reason i cannot eat oranges anymore is because they remind be of the tummy turning, skid mark lookin president tromp. if you enjoy living life with healthy, not itchy skin,, DO NOT GET THIS APP. like seriously. anyways........🤢

attributes.title: This app asked my race when I signed up
attributes.review: This app asked for my race when I signed up and gave special privileges to me versus my POC friends because I am white. When I tried to uninstall the app it asked me if I am a pansy liberal snowflake and if I don’t want to fight for white rights. This app is racist just like Donald trump and should be deleted and exiled like Donald trump.

attributes.title: Russian spyware?!
attributes.review: this app is hella sus like who asks for your number like that it’s weird undoubtedly the tackiest app bro the color scheme is ugly too it’s too much DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DISLIKE APPLES !!! idk why it just gives me like apple vibes tbh like if an app as an apple this would be it. forget tiktok bro they should ban this app 🤢 don’t ask for my number EVER again like that's just weird asl 😾

attributes.title: I hate this app ♥️♥️♥️
attributes.review: Something orange and resist kept poping up idk what is was but I had to walk McDonald’s to my dog and then my pet snail got hungry  so I gave him some food and then I remembered how proud I am to be LATINA and a supporter of the lgbtq and the blm not scared of our own country and hiding under a bunker under a pink house or White House something like that idk but yeah♥️♥️I don’t like this app♥️
